title: Vocabulary: Using Context Clues

vocab.definition: Hints in the text that help you understand the meaning of unknown words
When the meaning of a word is directly explained in the sentence
When examples help you understand what a word means
A word that means the same or almost the same as another word
A word that means the opposite of another word

teachingNotes: Practice with sentences that have clear context clues. Teach students to look before and after unknown words for hints. Use graphic organizers to identify clue types.

sample.question: What are hints in the text that help you understand unknown words?

truefalse.question: Context clues are always found in the same sentence as the unknown word.

multiplechoice.question: What type of context clue gives examples to help explain a word?

fillintheblank.question: A word that means the opposite of another word is called an ________.

shortanswer.question: In the sentence 'The ancient ruins were very old and crumbling,' what does 'ancient' probably mean?
